# openholidaysR

The goal of openholidaysR is to provide dates for public and school
holidays for a number of countries and their subdivisions through the
OpenHolidays API at <https://openholidaysapi.org/>.

## Installation

You can install the development version of openholidaysR from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("jfeldhege/openholidaysR")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to get all public holidays
for Germany for January 2025:

``` r
library(openholidaysR)

oh_public_holidays(country = "DE",
                   language = "DE",
                   start_date = "2025-01-01",
                   end_date = "2025-01-31")
#>                                     id  startDate    endDate   type
#> 1 27f0d8cd-76b2-47e7-89ac-a3a9f6a6b1ba 2025-01-01 2025-01-01 Public
#> 2 1c80b87d-8221-4dc2-9a1a-3b0f57dce9f5 2025-01-06 2025-01-06 Public
#>                      name regionalScope temporalScope nationwide
#> 1             DE, Neujahr      Regional       FullDay       TRUE
#> 2 DE, Heilige Drei KÃ¶nige      Regional       FullDay      FALSE
#>                      subdivisions
#> 1                            NULL
#> 2 DE-ST, DE-BW, DE-BY, ST, BW, BY
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`oh_countries()`](http://www.johannesfeldhege.de/openholidaysR/reference/oh_countries.md)
  : Get list of countries supported by OpenHolidays
- [`oh_languages()`](http://www.johannesfeldhege.de/openholidaysR/reference/oh_languages.md)
  : Get supported languages
- [`oh_public_holidays()`](http://www.johannesfeldhege.de/openholidaysR/reference/oh_public_holidays.md)
  : Get public holidays for a given country and time period
- [`oh_public_holidays_by_date()`](http://www.johannesfeldhege.de/openholidaysR/reference/oh_public_holidays_by_date.md)
  : Get public holidays for a specific date for all countries
- [`oh_school_holidays()`](http://www.johannesfeldhege.de/openholidaysR/reference/oh_school_holidays.md)
  : Get school holidays for a given country and time period
- [`oh_school_holidays_by_date()`](http://www.johannesfeldhege.de/openholidaysR/reference/oh_school_holidays_by_date.md)
  : Get school holidays for a specific date for all countries
- [`oh_stat_public_holidays()`](http://www.johannesfeldhege.de/openholidaysR/reference/oh_stat_public_holidays.md)
  [`oh_stat_school_holidays()`](http://www.johannesfeldhege.de/openholidaysR/reference/oh_stat_public_holidays.md)
  : Reads statistical data about stored holidays
- [`oh_subdivisions()`](http://www.johannesfeldhege.de/openholidaysR/reference/oh_subdivisions.md)
  : Get subdivisions for a given country
